name: GRIDLAST
description:
Credence is the last human on Earth, which sucks for him.

What sucks even more is that he is in his final stand against the Zombie Invasion, and he is heavily surrounded. How long will he be able to fight off the endless waves of zombies until his very (very) inevitable death?

GRIDLAST is a card-based strategy game where you must evade zombies by moving Credence on the grid and upgrading his abilities by using different cards.

Don't get hopeful, there is no winning for Credence.

MADE IN 72 HOURS FOR LUDUM DARE 50
